name: ERPSalesAssistant
0:
”Alexa call sales assistant”
”Revenue for corp ledger for current qtr”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: call sales assistant
des:
This Alexa skill is one of Smart Chatbots and Digital Assistants for Oracle Enterprise. Bots apply AI powered capabilities to interpret User input and understand business role and context. From here, bots employ machine learning to refine responses and deliver only relevant options based on consumer persona. 

To use this skill ask Alexa to call your "Sales Assistant". The Alexa skill then engages interactively with Sales Director role to enable key performance measures for Sales (e.g. revenue, product portfolio, order value etc.). 

The full release of the Alexa-enabled digital assistant offers a rich repository of pre-configured Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and operational measures.

Language supported : English
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
